employee.selectAssessment: Select an assessment below to begin. Your responses will help {{org}} improve and grow.
employee.ocaiDescription: Assess your organization's culture across 6 key dimensions using the Competing Values Framework.
employee.baldrigeDescription: Evaluate organizational excellence across 7 categories with the comprehensive Baldrige framework.
employee.noAssessments: No assessments available with your access key.
employee.infoOnce: Each assessment can only be taken once - no retakes allowed
employee.infoConfidential: Your responses are confidential and will be aggregated with others
employee.infoAutoSave: You can complete assessments in one sitting or return later (auto-save enabled)
employee.infoHonest: Answer honestly - there are no right or wrong answers
employee.infoCompleted: Once completed, you can view your results but cannot change answers

assessments.title: My Assessments
assessments.noAssessmentsDesc: You don't have any assessments assigned yet. Please check back later or contact your facilitator.

ocai.title: OCAI Assessment
ocai.description: Organizational Culture Assessment Instrument - Understand your organization's culture
